archimate:Driver.name: Ensure activities are aligned and supports DPS Transformation key objectives
archimate:Driver.documentation:
- Accelerate Cloud Growth by clearly defining and harmonizing platforms and offerings - Improve Profitability (Ebit) by datacenter consolidation and migration to enable cost savings and flexibility, improve environmental footprint and base for cloud transformation - Improve customer experienceâ€‹ by transforming customer workload in to new standard platforms and delivery models with accelerated phase
